definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to fall behind/to lag (in technology etc)/backward/to retrogress
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
to fall to the ground/to be set on the ground/to reach to the ground/to be born/(of a plane) to land
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
the curtain drops/the end of the show
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)

sentences.chinese: 雪花輕輕地落在窗玻璃上。

sentences.english: The wind has blown apples down.
Let your focus be on guiding your children to develop actual discipline.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的重點落在指導孩子形成真正的紀律自制上來。

sentences.english: It tumbled down through the bleeding tree and landed at our feet with a thud.
sentences.chinese: 它從滿是樹脂的樹上跌下來，砰的一聲落在我們腳前。

sentences.english: Some kid left this on the front porch.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子把這些落在前面的門廊了。

sentences.english: A lost item in the hole is also called "junk".
sentences.chinese: 落在井內的部件也叫做“井底髒物”。

sentences.english: Let your love in kisses rain. on my lips and eyelids pale.
sentences.chinese: 讓伱的愛隨吻的密雨降落，落在莪蒼白的脣和眼丄。

sentences.english: Tonight Moon people look, do not know song falls whose home.
sentences.chinese: 今夜月明人盡望，不知秋思落誰家。

sentences.english: The burden is on the developer for resolving these conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 解決這些衝突的負擔落在了開發人員身上。

sentences.english: Rootless things fly through the air toward her and land at her feet.
sentences.chinese: 空中的飛行物都會朝她飛來，落在她的腳邊。

sentences.english: The detaching distance is an important parameter for adjusting comber noil and combing quality.
sentences.chinese: 落棉隔距是影響精梳機落棉率與梳理質量的重要參數。

sentences.english: The marking criterion is inflexible and flexible. It has the selecting function.
sentences.chinese: 此標準機械而靈活，且具有相當的黜落功能。

sentences.english: Stupid! He's stolen food and hit the road! What did I expect?
sentences.chinese: 我真笨，它一定偷食物後落跑我還期望它會怎樣？

sentences.english: No knowing who think of his family.
A bee setting on a flower has stung a child .
sentences.chinese: 一隻落在一朵花上的密蜂螫了一個孩子。

sentences.english: That puts the company right on the fuzzy no man's land between value and growth.
sentences.chinese: 這就使谷歌剛好落在價值股與成長股的分界線上。

definition: to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
